name: sssd_ldap
description: Installs/Configures LDAP on RHEL using SSSD
long_description:
sssd_ldap Cookbook
==================
This cookbook installs SSSD and configures it for LDAP authentication

Requirements
------------
 - RHEL or a RHEL derivative OS
